page_content:
**Relevant Ghanaian policies**

The [National Strategy for the Development of Statistics (NSDS) 2018‐2022](https://statsghana.gov.gh/gssmain/storage/img/NSDS%20II%20Ghana_Revised_16.03.18.pdf) is a comprehensive strategic document which seeks to guide the evolution of the National Statistical System (NSS) to enable it to produce the statistical knowledge the country needs to fulfil its development potential. This NSDS is primarily concerned with setting a vision for the next 5 years (2018‐ 2022) and providing milestones that the NSS must reach to make that vision a reality. This strategy seeks to create a system which is capable of being responsive to users’ needs by providing a basis for results‐oriented strategic management of the NSS and acting as a framework to mobilise and manage resources.
